abstract: When ESPN analyst Jessica Mendoza said M.L.B. should have come down hard on players involved in the sign-stealing scheme, she was also criticizing the manager of the team she works for.
lead_paragraph: A Mets front office employee discussed the employment status of the Mets manager on television on Thursday. But was Jessica Mendoza speaking in her capacity as a Mets employee, or in her other capacity, as an ESPN baseball analyst?
